long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace boring new tab screen with random advice.

Each time you open a new tab, This extension will show random advice from https://api.adviceslip.com/

Just simple as that.

Stay safe.
